name: Just A Random Parkour Game
description:
This is really not a great game, just posting it because I might update later?

This is just a random parkour game I made in unity 3.5.7f6, to try and finally start my youtube channel... the unity 3 part and the youtube part make this not a great game, you can play if you want to play a super basic game made in unity 3 lol, I may update it later. It only has one level because the other doesn't appear correctly... yeah I will probably update it, even if it was supposed to be not great, I do want to improve it at least a bit. but for real it isn't a great game at least at the moment so if you want that, please look somewhere else
